Fantasy.title: The Name of the Wind
Fantasy.description: A captivating fantasy novel about a young man's journey to become a powerful wizard.
customerReviews: A must-read for any fantasy enthusiast.

Science Fiction.title: Project Hail Mary
Science Fiction.description: A thrilling science fiction adventure following a lone astronaut's mission to save humanity.
customerReviews: Couldn't put it down until the very end.

Mystery Fiction.title: The Silent Patient
Mystery Fiction.description: A gripping psychological thriller about a woman who stops speaking after a mysterious event.
customerReviews: Keeps you guessing until the very end!
Twists and turns you won't see coming.

Horror Fiction.title: Pet Sematary
Horror Fiction.description: A chilling horror novel about a burial ground with the power to bring the dead back to life.

Historical Fiction.title: The Nightingale
Historical Fiction.description: A heart-wrenching historical fiction novel set in France during World War II, following the lives of two sisters.
customerReviews: A must-read for fans of historical fiction.

Women's Fiction.title: Big Little Lies
Women's Fiction.description: A gripping women's fiction novel that delves into the secrets and lies of a seemingly perfect community.

Literary Fiction.title: The Kite Runner
Literary Fiction.description: A powerful literary fiction novel exploring themes of friendship, betrayal, and redemption in Afghanistan.
customerReviews: Will stay with you long after you finish.

Magic Realism.title: One Hundred Years of Solitude
Magic Realism.description: A mesmerizing magic realism novel chronicling the Buend√≠a family through generations in the fictional town of Macondo.

Graphic Novel.title: Watchmen
Graphic Novel.description: A groundbreaking graphic novel that explores complex themes of power, morality, and identity in a world of masked vigilantes.
customerReviews: A must-read for graphic novel enthusiasts!

Short Story.title: Selected Stories of Anton Chekhov
Short Story.description: A collection of masterfully crafted short stories by the renowned Russian author, Anton Chekhov.

Young Adult Fiction.title: The Hunger Games
Young Adult Fiction.description: An action-packed young adult dystopian novel set in a future where teenagers are forced to fight to the death in a televised event.

New Adult Fiction.title: Beautiful Disaster
New Adult Fiction.description: A steamy new adult romance novel about love, passion, and second chances.

Biography.title: Steve Jobs
Biography.description: An insightful biography of the visionary co-founder of Apple, Steve Jobs.
customerReviews: A must-read for anyone interested in technology.

Self-help.title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
Self-help.description: A no-nonsense self-help book that encourages readers to embrace life's challenges and focus on what truly matters.

History.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
History.description: A fascinating journey through the history of Homo sapiens, from the emergence of our species to the present day.
customerReviews: A must-read for anyone interested in history.

True Crime.title: In Cold Blood
True Crime.description: A chilling true crime masterpiece that recounts the brutal murder of the Clutter family in rural Kansas.

Essay.title: Slouching Towards Bethlehem
Essay.description: A collection of essays by Joan Didion that offers poignant reflections on American life in the 1960s.

Dystopian.description: A dystopian classic that explores themes of totalitarianism, surveillance, and individual freedom.
customerReviews: A must-read for any dystopian fan.

Action & Adventure.title: Jurassic Park
Action & Adventure.description: An action-packed adventure novel about a theme park filled with genetically engineered dinosaurs.

Thriller & Suspense.title: The Girl on the Train
Thriller & Suspense.description: A gripping psychological thriller about a woman who becomes entangled in a missing persons investigation.
customerReviews: Keeps you guessing until the very end.

Romance Novel.title: Outlander
Romance Novel.description: A captivating historical romance novel that follows the passionate love story of a World War II nurse and a Scottish Highlander.

LGBTQ+.title: Call Me by Your Name
LGBTQ+.description: A poignant LGBTQ+ romance novel set in Italy during the 1980s, exploring themes of love, desire, and self-discovery.

Contemporary Fiction.title: Little Fires Everywhere
Contemporary Fiction.description: A compelling contemporary fiction novel that explores race, privilege, and motherhood in suburban America.

Children's.title: Where the Wild Things Are
Children's.description: A beloved children's picture book about a young boy's imaginative journey to an island inhabited by wild creatures.

Memoir & Autobiography.title: Becoming
Memoir & Autobiography.description: An inspiring memoir by former First Lady Michelle Obama, chronicling her journey from a childhood on the South Side of Chicago to the White House.

Food & Drink.title: The Joy of Cooking
Food & Drink.description: A classic cookbook that offers comprehensive instructions on cooking techniques and a wide range of recipes.

Art & Photography.title: The Story of Art
Art & Photography.description: An accessible and comprehensive introduction to the history of art, from prehistoric times to the present day.

Travel.title: The Alchemist
Travel.description: A captivating travelogue by Paulo Coelho, following the journey of a young shepherd named Santiago as he searches for treasure in Egypt.

Humor.title: Bossypants
Humor.description: A hilarious memoir by comedian Tina Fey, offering insights into her life and career in comedy.
customerReviews: A must-read for fans of Tina Fey.

Guide / How-to.title: The Life-Changing Magic of Tidying Up
Guide / How-to.description: A practical guide to decluttering and organizing your home by renowned tidying expert Marie Kondo.
